column2:
"This guy's slowing me down.
Well, let him play with his forest data. He won't learn anything from it."
"That's not enough for me, though. I want to throw myself into a bloody battle against a horde of enemies."
"Yes... Take me to a quest where I can fight a hundred enemies at once."
"We find our satisfaction in the same places, you and I... Gahaha...!"
